PyUncertainNumber.UC.statistical_inference
==========================================

.. py:module:: PyUncertainNumber.UC.statistical_inference

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Here we define the statistical inference functions from data for the UncertainNumber class.

   .. rubric:: Examples

   - maximum likelihood
   - method of matching moments
   - confidence boxes
   - maximum entropy
   - Bayesian inference
   - maximum a posteriori
   - PERT
   - Fermi methods
